channel.title: Posts on MyBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on MyBlog

item.title: LaunchX Experience
item.description: I never imagined a TikTok post would bring me this far. Here is part of my experience participating in the Launch X full stack development bootcamp offered by @inovaccionvirtual on the first half of 2022. How It Started At the beginning of the year I was looking into TikTok and found an interesting post regarding a course for full stack development tools. This kind of activity caught my eye since I was looking into expanding my portfolio of tools in order to increase my chance of switching careers.

item.title: Welcome to MyBlog
item.description: Hello, thank you for taking some time to visit my blog. Here you can follow my experience transitioning into the technology industry, whether it is participating in bootcamps, idea brainstorm, project ideation among many others. I want to invite you to read my AboutMe to learn more about who am I and why I am starting this blog.
